thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Speedway Motorsports Reports Q4 EPS Of $2.77

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Speedway Motorsports Reports Q4 EPS Of $2.77
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Speedway Motorsports Inc:
* SPEEDWAY MOTORSPORTS REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017 AND PROVIDES FULL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.00 TO $1.20
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.02
* Q4 REVENUE $76.4 MILLION * SPEEDWAY MOTORSPORTS - ESTIMATES 2018 TOTAL CAPEX $20 MILLION - $30 MILLION
* SPEEDWAY MOTORSPORTS - ‍NON-RECURRING BENEFITS OF INCOME TAX LAW CHANGES OF $119.4 MILLION OR $2.91 PER DILUTED SHARE IN 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
